price: (Ó ṣe mí ní) oníwà rere sí ìyá mi. Kò sì ṣe mí ní ajẹninípá, olórí burúkú.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
